name: Awesomeness
description: Anything referring to the individual's general level of awesomeness. Sometimes referred to as coolness, badassery, etc.

metrics.name: Prefers exactly 49 slices of pepperoni on a pizza.
Saved a baby from an alligator by punching it in the face.
metrics.description: We're gonna level with you. We have no idea if this happened, but it sounded AWESOME!!! And everybody's talking about so we figured we'd give it to ya.

metrics.name: Uses Facebook.
metrics.description: Seriously?! You know who uses Facebook? Your parents. And their parents. And Grumpy Cat!

name: Expeditiousness
description: The individual's experience with exploring the world.

metrics.name: Being alive.
metrics.description: Congratulations on not being dead! This entitles you to 300 Street Cred!

metrics.name: "Street Experience"
metrics.description: You have visted exactly {{ value }} streets in your lifetime.

metrics.name: Switched Lanes without using a Turn Signal {{ value }} times in the last week.
metrics.description: How could you! Turn signals aren't like blind spots. They ARE for other drivers.
